channel.title: Customize :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Customize Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 50 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: Need to discuss further with Brent or owner of this section to get their opinion Saying this, I do believe we can make it more clear which guide targets which solution: (e.g. Redirect, embedded, etc) Why is this here?

item.title: Add your brand to Okta’s UI
item.description: Add your brand to Okta’s user interface Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 51 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: Brands: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/brands/ Page type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews.

item.title: Style the Sign-In Widget (3rd gen)

Also, is the guide for the embedded sign-in widget or just redirect?
